message: Bob, I have a fantastic opportunity for you! I'm offering you this unique product, which I know will be extremely valuable to your operations.  While I'm not willing to disclose the exact value to me, I'm confident it's worth significantly more than $800000.  I'm willing to let you have it for a price of $1200000, a price I believe is fair considering the potential it holds for you.  This is a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity, so don't miss out!
